function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate mental health support for patients and the public during a contagious disease outbreak","Impact":"Increased psychological distress and inability to cope with the stress of the outbreak, leading to worsening mental health outcomes","Mitigation":"Provide information on usual reactions to stress, offer stress management and coping suggestions, link patients to mental health services, limit exposure to emotionally disturbing media reports, and encourage open discussions about children's reactions","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms for remote mental health support, AI chatbots for providing information and coping strategies","People":"Patients, family members, the public","Owner":"Health care providers, mental health professionals, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate mental health support for healthcare providers during a contagious disease outbreak","Impact":"Increased stress, burnout, and decreased ability to perform professional responsibilities effectively, leading to compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Provide mental health care, monitor stress reactions, offer professional mental health intervention, alter assignments and schedules, and create mechanisms to offer psychosocial support","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms for remote mental health support, AI chatbots for stress monitoring and coping assistance","People":"Healthcare providers, including mental health professionals","Owner":"Healthcare systems, hospitals, professional associations"},{"Description":"Overwhelmed health care systems due to stress on individual providers and general operations during a contagious disease outbreak","Impact":"Decreased performance, compromised patient care, and increased risk of medical errors and adverse outcomes","Mitigation":"Monitor reactions and performance, alter assignments and schedules, modify expectations, and offer psychosocial support as needed","Technologies":"AI for performance monitoring, scheduling optimization software, telemedicine for psychosocial support","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare systems, hospitals, professional associations"}]}
